thread.title: Watch Paul Pogba hit the bullseye with a pass on a giant dart board | FOX Sports
thread.title_full: Watch Paul Pogba hit the bullseye with a pass on a giant dart board | FOX Sports

author: Alex Dowd
title: Watch Paul Pogba hit the bullseye with a pass on a giant dart board | FOX Sports
text:
Feb 9, 2017 at 2:32p ET 0Shares 
As the world’s most expensive player, Paul Pogba is expected to put on a show wherever he goes. He’s just recently started putting it all together for Manchester United on the pitch, but he’s in top form off of it. 
At an open training session for the Red Devils, the 23-year-old Frenchman was tasked with shooting a ball at a gigantic inflatable dart board. He nailed the bullseye. 
— Manchester United (@ManUtd) February 9, 2017 
Wipe those hands clean, Paul. You’re done for the day. As accurate as Pobga was on the dart board (side note: I need one), he’s had some bad luck when it comes to matches. In the Premier League alone, Pogba has hit the woodwork five times. That’s second only to Man City’s Kevin de Bruyne, who’s hit it six times. 
Pogba’s tough luck with the woodwork wouldn’t be as unfortunate if he were still finding the inside of the uprights and crossbar, but he’s managed just four goals on the season. Still, he’s one of the biggest talents on the planet and an adjustment period is warranted. 
Maybe he could just visualize a bullseye next time he’s firing off a shot?
